vista.graph
Class MultiPlot

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.GEContainer
          vista.graph.Plot
              vista.graph.MultiPlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, BoundedComposite, Composite, Drawable, DrawableComposite, FontResizable, Layoutable
public class MultiPlot
extends Plot

A class containing a set of Plot objects. All operations similar to plot are delegated to the current plot object.

Version:
$Id: MultiPlot.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:05 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
See Also:
Plot

addGrid

public void addGrid(int position)
adds grid lines for the axis (lines perpendicular to axis running the distance of the plot area). The grid lines are placed at major tick marks for the given axis.

Overrides:
addGrid in class Plot
Parameters:
position - The position of the axis
